title: IMPORTANT!!! NO PRIOR QUEUE IN BOTS
body: Last week i was playing a bot match because i was bored. Within 4mins of playing, my client disconnected. When i reconnected, it said that i have been off for a prolonged period and i got prior queue......... in bots. We shouldn't get banned from bot games because we are not playing against real people and without one person you can still win the match in bots.... very easily.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey xXODINXx,

While I can understand that it may be frustrating waiting 20 minutes before a game to start playing; however, it's less about a team being able to win without you, and moreso that you negatively impacted a match. Players aren't given Low Priority Queue for single instances of disconnects/AFKing, but rather for multiple instances. If you have any technical issues, you're more than free to come into the Help & Support sub-boards and we'll work with you to resolve any issues you may be encountering.
I know how you feel  man. Many times my league client has stuffed up and then i get banned......its annoying.{{item:3070}}
